txt.en: You have been tasked with defeating ice-giants and recovering stolen treasures.
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Hórin for your reward!

'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].

'My scouts have come back from one of the caverns that weaves throughout Gundabad. Ice-giants have stolen several treasures from within Gundabad and secured them behind a series of gates.

'Defeat ice-giants and recover treasures stolen from the depths of Gundabad!'

Amongst the halls of Gundabad, countless treasures await to be reclaimed. Ice-giants have breached one of the treasure halls and made off with our valuables.\n\nYour mission is to recover the stolen treasures and punish the ice-giants for their actions.
You must find a way to breach a barrier to reach your mission objective.
Your mission is to defeat ice-giants and recover stolen treasures.\n\nSpeak to Hórin to travel to the ice-giant enclave.
'Well done! With the stolen treasures reclaimed, we will have additional resources for our great effort!'
